flavor_text: Small Pokemon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.
Groups of this Pokemon migrating in search of water have been mistaken for 'moving forests.'
Some Pokemon are born on a TORTERRA's back and spend their entire life there.
Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground a gigantic TORTERRA dwelled.
